docs.text: GEOCS ¶ GEOCS - Gate of Earth Observation for Calculate Statistics Documentation: https://fitriandriastuti.github.io/geocsdoc Source Code: https://github.com/fitriandriastuti/geocs ¶ GEOCS is a set of Python projects aimed at labeling, organizing, modeling, classifying, and analyzing satellite imagery data for statistical data estimation. Part of Project ¶ backend - The GEOCS backend is built on top of the FastAPI framework. frontend - The GEOCS frontend is built on top of the Flask framework. database server - GEOCS database using MongoDB . tile server - GEOCS tile server using https://developmentseed.org/titiler/ . Live Project ¶ backend - https://geocsapi.fitrengineer.com . frontend - https://geocs.fitrengineer.com . tile server - https://geocstitiler.fitrengineer.com . Features ¶ Dynamic labeling of satellite imagery data. Organizing image data in the form of tiles on the MongoDB database and Object Storage. Then display the tiles using TiTiler. Dynamic modeling of satellite imagery data based on predefined data labeling and selection of satellite imagery data types. Classification of satellite imagery data into labeling classes that have been previously created. Installation ¶ Installation Backend GEOCS ¶ To install Backend GEOCS from PyPI and run: ¶ git clone https://github.com/fitriandriastuti/geocsapi cd geocsapi pip install -r requirements.txt uvicorn app.main:app --reload To install Backend GEOCS with Docker locally: ¶ git clone https://github.com/fitriandriastuti/geocsapi cd geocsapi docker compose -f docker-compose.yml up -d --build Project Structure Backend GEOCS: ¶ app/ - Geocs backend modules. Installation Frontend GEOCS ¶ To install Frontend GEOCS from PyPI and run: ¶ git clone https://github.com/fitriandriastuti/geocs cd geocs pip install -r requirements.txt uvicorn app.main:app --reload To install Frontend GEOCS with Docker locally: ¶ git clone https://github.com/fitriandriastuti/geocs cd geocs docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml up -d --build Project Structure Frontend GEOCS: ¶ app/ - Geocs frontend modules. Installation Tile Server GEOCS ¶ To install Tile Server GEOCS from PyPI and run: ¶ git clone https://github.com/fitriandriastuti/geocstitiler cd geocstitiler pip install -r requirements.txt uvicorn src.titiler.geocstitiler.main:app --reload To install Tile Server GEOCS with Docker locally: ¶ git clone https://github.com/fitriandriastuti/geocstitiler cd geocstitiler docker compose -f docker-compose.yml up -d --build Project Structure Tile Server GEOCS: ¶ src/geocstitiler/ - Tile Server GEOCS with Titiler modules. ├── static/ - CSS and JS page ├── template/ - HTML page └── main.py - Main file of project. Installation Module Classification GEOCS ¶ To install Module Classification GEOCS from PyPI Environment and run: ¶ git clone https://github.com/fitriandriastuti/geocsclassification cd geocsclassification python -m venv venvgeocsclassification . venvgeocsclassification/bin/activate pip install -r requirements.txt python -m ipykernel install --user --name venvgeocsclassification--display-name "venvgeocsclassification" jupyter notebook To install Module Classification GEOCS with Conda Environment locally: ¶ git clone https://github.com/fitriandriastuti/geocsclassification cd geocsclassification . /Users/username/opt/Anaconda3/bin/activate conda create --name venvgeocsclassification python = 3 .9.6 conda activate venvgeocsclassification conda install --file requirements.txt jupyter notebook Project Structure Module Classification GEOCS: ¶ src/geocstitiler/ - Tile Server GEOCS with Titiler modules. ├── static/ - CSS and JS page ├── template/ - HTML page └── main.py - Main file of project. Authors ¶ Created by Fitri Andri Astuti Mentored by I Gusti Bagus Baskara Nugraha, S.T., M.T., Ph.D.

docs.text: INTO TO GEOCS ¶ ¶ GEOCS - Gate of Earth Observation for Calculate Statistics The growing development of satellite image data can be used to analyze land use in the region. This can be used as an indicator in seeing economic growth in a region. This system aims to analyze satellite image data automatically and calculate capital stock. From pixel analysis to intelligent calculation of statistics. to Better Knowledge of Statistics Calculations. The main functions of this system are: Data Labeling Imagery Modeling Background Tasks
docs.title: Intro

docs.text: GEOCS - Gate of Earth Observation for Calculate Statistics The growing development of satellite image data can be used to analyze land use in the region. This can be used as an indicator in seeing economic growth in a region. This system aims to analyze satellite image data automatically and calculate capital stock. From pixel analysis to intelligent calculation of statistics. to Better Knowledge of Statistics Calculations. The main functions of this system are: Data Labeling Imagery Modeling Background Tasks
